Reviews.Title: It actually is a great camera.
Reviews.Author: blinkythedog
Reviews.Content: At first I was a little more than turned off by this camera. Then I read some of the negative reviews on Amazon, and started to think that I had gotten duped into buying this camera due to the price point. At first it seemed that all my pictures were blurry, but now I'm here to defend this camera. It really is a great camera. Not the best best camera, but still a good camera. The problem with this camera is that you can't just unbox it, put it on the "Auto" setting and constantly get great pictures. You actually have to do a little bit more work with it sometimes. The thing that changed my first impression of this camera was the "Scene" function. All I wanted was to get some pictures that could clearly show others what I was seeing at the moment I took the photo. Pictures were blurry, some of the main aspects of photos were out of focus, too dark, too bright, too shaky, or zoom just messed everything up. Then I discovered the "Scene" function. Any photo that the "Auto" or "Manual" setting had a hassle of getting right, the "Scene" function could fix. After that, my photos were phenomenal. In the end, the outcome of the photos are really what matter, and that's why I'm giving it a high rating. The reason I don't give it five stars is because of the view screen. Something happens between taking the photo and seeing the outcome on the view screen. No matter what, it will look like you've gotten poor shots judging by the view screen. Today, I asked someone to get a shot of some friends and myself with the camera. The person took a second shot because the first looked blurry, I responded by saying "It's okay. The picture is fine, the camera just does that." Cameras shouldn't do that. I was right though. The picture was great when viewed on my laptop. I will also agree that this camera looks cheap. It looks like a cheap Vivitar. Also, on the issue of batteries. If you hook the camera to a computer, the screen comes on and will continue to drain juice. I use an external reader, and my battery life is fine. Like I said before. This really is an actually decent camera.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Vickie S. Chapman
Reviews.Content: This camera has gotten some bad reviews but I don't know why. Surely it must be the best camera out there for under $100. Check out pictures on my blog ([...]) from June, July, and August 2010. These were all taken with this camera. The menus are very easy to use... I didn't even need to look at the manual to figure out how to do videos, closeups, control the flash, etc, etc. The screen is as visible in bright sunlight as any I've seen. The software that comes with it works well and has some cool features (like face recognition).My one caution is that it's fragile. I dropped it from maybe 4 feet, and it quit working. I don't know that this is any more fragile than most cameras; I did the same thing to my previous camera which is why I bought this one in the first place. Anyway, after I dropped this one, because I liked it so much, I ordered another one just like it.

Reviews.Title: a good little camera
Reviews.Author: Engine Driver
Reviews.Content: This is a great value.  It is a good little camera for the money.  It is handy and takes good pictures inside and out.  My only issue is with the seller, who said that they were sending a black camera.  This was what was ordered, but not what was sent.  A silver camera was sent. This is not a big deal, I'm not especially fussy about the color.  I am fussy about factual truth, so find the seller's bogus claim that they sent what was ordered to be annoying.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Steve in AZ "author1701"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a backup to my main camera. It's not bad in bright sunlight or even bright indoor light, but get it in low light conditions and it's marginal at best. Getting autofocus to work in low light conditions is just about impossible. Even in overcast conditions, ideal for most photography, the autofocus is horrible. Using Olympus' version of motion dampening didn't help, either.Lots of great bells and whistles including the ability to go full manual. Can't seem to turn off the digital zoom, though, which is quite annoying. Battery life seems pretty good. Photo quality, when you can actually get the thing to focus, is very good with very little fringing even with the zoom.It's an OK camera if you're using it for everyday outdoor shooting, but don't count on it to be anything other than mediocre. Even with a lower end camera like this, I expected more from Olympus.

Reviews.Title: Issues from the start
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera was suppose to be a really good camera. It has pixels missing from the LED Screen and the flash doesn't work properly. I am very disappointed with this product. MY phone takes better pictures than this!!!!

Reviews.Title: Pictures are great - videos okay
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace a 5-year-old Olympus digital and was thrilled at both how much the cost had gone down on digital cameras and at the decrease in size.The photo quality is excellent - both in outside shots (high or low light - especially on a cloudy day), and inside shots with or without the flash (I prefer the automatic setting, though sometimes will turn the flash off).  Also works well for macro shots and in the zoom setting.  Lots of extra features - pretty self-explanatory or on the included CD manual.  You do not have to be an expert to use this camera.  Color has been excellent and true to original.Video quality is okay - what we expected with a camera in this price range (I am coveting one of the more expensive Olympus cameras and hope to eventually get one with a better video option).  A bit grainy and doesn't do well inside - need a lot of light to get a good quality video.  Does MUCH better outside during the day.  BUT we purchased this to be a photo camera, not a video camera - this feature was considered a bonus for us.I am a loyal Olympus purchaser.  So far I have been extremely happy with all of my purchases from this brand.

Reviews.Title: No toma buenas fotografias 16:9
Reviews.Author: Shair Viera Martinez
Reviews.Content: tengo un monitor y televisor rectangular con aspecto 16:9 y esta cámara no toma fotos así... las toma pero como en 3 Mega Pixel... y no tiene buena calidad... si requieren de tomar fotos 4:3 se las recomiendo... aunque el foco y el balance de blancos no son muy buenos...

Reviews.Title: Very Good Camera For The Price
Reviews.Author: Marfa Otano "CraftingMarfa"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my mother, whose only camera knowledge is how to look at the screen and press the shutter.  She loves it and has been taking pictures since I gave it to her for Mothers' Day.  As a student photographer, I was interested in a point and shoot that I could have as a backup for my DSLR.  It had to give me the ability to control some of the features, which this camera does.  If you're looking for a simple point and shoot camera this one is great.  My mother and I are both very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Takes good pictures.
Reviews.Author: Mark. S.
Reviews.Content: It was working fine and still does, except the big black circle on LCD screen. It started as a small dot. But now, it has grown big to a 3/8" circle. Based on some research on line, it seems like this camera has tendency of having this circle.

Reviews.Title: An Okay Camera
Reviews.Author: Lee S. Ferguson Jr. "drummerboysurfer"
Reviews.Content: This is an average camera that is cost effective and is good for taking on vacations. The picture quality is more like a 12 megapixel camera than a 14 MP one. With no outstanding features, I would recommend this camera for casual, non-professional use and purchasing it at a good price.

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: deisy rodriguez
Reviews.Content: muy buen producto y a muy buen precio ..... intente comprar otra camara y ya el precio habia aumentado :( pero de verdad muy bune producto

Reviews.Title: Battery life is really bad!!!! Image is OK
Reviews.Author: cirekcr "Erick4"
Reviews.Content: The camera is great regarding pictures but battery life is really bad, I really do not recommend to buy this item. I know is cheap but the battery life only works for an hour or two if you're lucky I have tried with several kind of batteries and is the same.The quality of the images is acceptable, the zoom is good for the price I paid. It was a gift for my cousin. She loves the camera but she only takes pictures, no video no nothing, and is always complaining about the batteries.

Reviews.Title: A fair camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Adams
Reviews.Content: After having two weeks to try this camera out I have come to a couple of conclusions - find SPOT autofocus setting as quick as you can as the Face/iESP is responsible for most poor photos.  I assume it is trying to find faces in the grass, trees, water, rubble, etc. and produces a poor focus.  Second, the 14 mega pixels is empty resolution, probably past about 4 or 5 mega pixels - the very large jpg files are a nuisance to edit as they require a lot of memory and beyond 50% of scale in Photoshop shows why so much of it is empty resolution - filled with blotches (50% of resolution means I'm looking at 1/4 the area of the image.)  Not the best on batteries, but I haven't been using the powersaving settings, yet.  It is pretty handy for a quick grab-and-go camera and takes adequate pictures.  For the $60 I paid this really is quite a good bargain, just don't expect it to compete with an SLR.

Reviews.Title: good camera for the price,not perfect
Reviews.Author: ariel
Reviews.Content: well i bought this camera in another site for $ 100 and bought another one here in amazon for $ 61 dollars including shipping ,what a great deal.to be sincere the camera is great,you must adjust some settings before use it for the first time.i take amazing pictures with it but must admit it looks like it has lower megapixels than 14,anyway is a very good camera for the price and iam happy with it after trying a vivitar brand that was awful and i got very desapointed,there are better cameras out there but this olympus camera is a great deal for the quality and price.i recomend it if you can't afford a high price camera.

Reviews.Title: Get to know it
Reviews.Author: Randale
Reviews.Content: Heres my take it's a camera that looks cheap and my be a bummer if you are someone who is used to just using the auto setting. Read the manual and experiment with the photo modes and the really neat features hidden.The screen is deceiving as the images on review look ugly but are real nice quality on the PC.The battery life is good and the power save mode is a real nice add on. It also has features to adjust between battery cell type. Setback is the focus is not that good most times unless using the DIS or face face tracking.Heres a heads up read the manual and try the different modes in different conditions rather than using auto mode and you will see vivid sharp images. The DIS mode handles the widest range of sceneries.

Reviews.Title: This camera is great!
Reviews.Author: Wild Man Cody
Reviews.Content: I just got my Olympus FE-47 digital camera yesterday and I love it. This camera is easy to use and to figure out and it takes pretty good pictures. I got this camera for sixty nine dollars and it's worth it. I didn't buy mine from amazon though(sorry amazon, I still love you!). It's a very good camera for the money. It's got a lot of settings and features on it. This is my first digital camera and I think that this could be a good camera for anybody. A cool thing about this camera is that it not only came with a USB cable to hook up to a computer, it also came with an AV cable to hook up to a TV. I'm so glad that I bought this camera! The only thing I don't like about this camera is that it goes through batteries fast. It takes two double AA's. You should probably get some rechargeable batteries and a charger if you decide to get this camera.

Reviews.Title: Battery Power Problem
Reviews.Author: Livewell
Reviews.Content: This camera takes good pictures outside on a pretty day. Pictures taken indoors are off color. The big problem is the battery life. After just a few minutes all power is gone. I am returning this unit for another new camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic at this price ... excellent when hiking or at home.
Reviews.Author: David R. Burns "Questions Authority"
Reviews.Content: I am not sure, but I think I have made at least several hundred images with this simple, near fool proof camera.  In some shots, I got a better image that with a more expensive item I took along for the trip. If this is your price range, you will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Faster shipment
Reviews.Author: Owura-kwaku Sarkodieh "ax1290"
Reviews.Content: It arrived before I could blink and the value was good for the money as well. Looking forward to doing business with them again and again.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT !!! =)
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: Great product arrived in spectacular time for my vacation i ordered this camera hoping to get it before my vacation on the 23rd and got it by the 20th which was extremely great the camera worked as great as i expected it i coukldnt ask fo ranything better thank you. I  couldnt have asked for anything more with the great price i paid for this camera the camera has great visuals and is very sleek . I WOULD DEFINITELY RECCOMEND THIS PRODUT TO ANYONE .

Reviews.Title: Great camera, crappy battery life
Reviews.Author: Momof3
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is wonderful, many different picture options... it works great. Except when it comes to batteries. I'm a mom of 3 boys so pictures are naturally more frequent. I've owned this camera for 3 days now and have had to change the batteries atleast twice a day. I bought rechargeable batteries and it seems to last even shorter, a whole 30 minutes. I even have the battery saver option on where the viewing screen will black out after 10 seconds of inactivity, it still doesn't help. If you have a case of batteries with you at all times, this camera is for you!

Reviews.Title: Eh...
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: So I got this camera for Europe thinking it would be a great compact camera that wasn't too expensive.  I have a decent larger camera that would take up a lot of space, but I thought I would feel bad if something happened to it.  When the camera arrived, I tested it right away and was extremely disappointed.  I have gotten better quality pictures on my cell phone camera with its cheap little 3.1 megapixel camera (though I know megapixels does not necessarily equal good pictures).  The pictures were grainy, the menus were hard to use and the camera burned through batteries pretty quick (even considering the cheapness of the batteries).  The guidebook barely qualifies as a piece of paper and the information on it is "how to power on" and useless obvious stuff like that.  Spend money on a different camera.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!
Reviews.Author: Slip-n-Slide
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a few months back for a concert i was going to. I had a really old olympus camera that had 4 MP. This camera was a good deal i thought, but no! I have maybe only taken ONE good picture with this camera!! The picture comes out soo blury and so fuzzy no matter what i do! It might be a good deal, but you are better off getting a 20$ camera from walmart! Please dont make the same mistake i did! My old 4 MP camera is better than this one. Too bad i cant return it...

ProductInfo.Features:
14-megapixel resolution for high-quality, poster-size prints
5x optical zoom
AF tracking; Intelligent Auto
Advanced Face Detection and Creative Art Filters
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-47 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-inch LCD (Black)
